item.title: Elisa add a quote by Adlai E. Stevenson
item.description: "It's hard to lead a cavalry charge if you think you look funny on a horse." -- Adlai E. Stevenson

item.title: Elisa add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "If you are irritated by every rub, how will your mirror be polished?" -- Rumi

item.title: Elisa add a quote by Evelyn Waugh
item.description: "Punctuality is the virtue of the bored." -- Evelyn Waugh

item.title: Elisa add a quote by Elizabeth Taylor
item.description: "The problem with people who have no vices is that generally you can be pretty sure they're going to have some pretty annoying virtues." -- Elizabeth Taylor

item.title: Elisa add a quote by Edith Sitwell
item.description: "I have often wished I had time to cultivate modesty...But I am too busy thinking about myself." -- Edith Sitwell

item.title: Elisa add a quote by Peter De Vries
item.description: "Everybody hates me because I'm so universally liked." -- Peter De Vries

item.title: Elisa add a quote by Gilda Radner
item.description: "I'd much rather be a woman than a man. Women can cry, they can wear cute clothes, and they are the first to be rescued off of sinking ships." -- Gilda Radner

item.title: Elisa add a quote by Gilda Radner
Elisa add a quote by Gene Wilder
item.description: "Climbing hills was never one of my great ambitions. Perhaps I was just lazy, but I admit--now that I've been climbing a hill every other day--that it's very difficult to think about the stresses in your life while you're trying to avoid falling backwards when a goat with large horns is chasing you because you came too close to the little patch of grass he was planning to eat for breakfast." -- Gene Wilder

item.title: Elisa add a quote by John Cowper Powys
item.description: "One needs no strange spiritual faith to worship the earth." -- John Cowper Powys

item.title: Elisa add a quote by Thich Nhat Hanh
item.description: "Walk as if you are kissing the Earth with your feet." -- Thich Nhat Hanh

item.title: Elisa add a quote by Pat Conroy
item.description: "You get a little moody sometimes but I think that's because you like to read. People that like to read are always a little fucked up." -- Pat Conroy
